website_summaries.verdict: For a stylish design and solid performance, the HTC U11 is a discount over the U12 Plus, though power users will be drawn to the U12 Plus' more robust squeezing features.
pros: The HTC U11 gives you excellent performance, a gorgeous design, water resistance and a big-screen for much less than the HTC U12 Plus
cons: The HTC U11’s squeezable sides feel more gimmicky than novel, as does HTC's virtual assistant
The stunning glass rear is prone to smudging, and the battery felt very thirsty

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Google Maps regularly freezes and won't shut down, Google Play Store won't even open. I've had to do all kinds of things to fix them. I've had an HTC Desire in the past, then moved to Sony Xperia (two models), then thought I'd come back to HTC. It's a very pretty phone, and mostly fast.
customer_reviews.author: diva666

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from the HTC 10 and it's absolutely phenomenal. One thing that stands out is the amazing battery life. It's twice as good than on the 10 and genuinely lasts the whole day. By the time I get to bed it's on half or a bit less.
customer_reviews.author: Abid Rahman

customer_reviews.title: dont buy from k t supreme
customer_reviews.text: phone was ideal but was ripped off by the seller k t m supreme phones supposedly new were not and been modified by the seller company about to be struck off and cant contact seller who returned recorded letters so cant get my money back
customer_reviews.author: K. Elsworth

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone - fast and large memory
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace one of these that was about 4 years old, well out of warranty and died after the charging point died. So far this is doing everything I would expect, battery life not great - like any smartphone, I am constantly on it and so it does run down. Definitely would recommend this phone and seller.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Parker

customer_reviews.title: Replacement please
customer_reviews.text: I got my phone it was beautiful but didn't work properly an I'm finding it hard to get a replacement .i wish Amazon would step in and help me out yours sincerely Gary Smith
customer_reviews.author: GARY SMITH

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for sub £400.
customer_reviews.text: Great phone from HTC which has a stylish glass finish, But the screen in sunlight is not clear so having to adjust brightness manually. The auto brightness does not seem to be as good as M8 HTC. Overall a good phone for sub £400.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and good battery life..
customer_reviews.text: Had the HTC 10 and very pleased with that one so the logical choice was to by the later model.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best on the market
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit hesitant to buy this phone after reading the reviews but I am glad I have. It is honestly the best phone Ive had and seen.The picture quality and sound quality are excellent. I am really impressed with this phone and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: taffy_gary

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this latest HTC
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this latest HTC. Great sound quality, extremely fast, no apps have been a problem to run (including games). The game changes for me is the squeeze control. Two options, long squeeze & short with any function you want. I have camera on short squeeze (so the camera pops up without any password entry) and long squeeze I have set as the torch. The camera is excellent and it's got the all important micro SD card slot. A nice extra touch was a free dropbox subscription for 2 years :)
customer_reviews.author: Tired Dad

customer_reviews.title: Nice upgrade from m9.
customer_reviews.text: Like HTC. Only complaint so far after a month or so is the bloatware News app that can only be disabled and not uninstalled. Keyboard app bit different to original sense but getting used to it. Camera worked well in various lighting so far. Audio on speakers very good and headphones really good. It is a bit daft that you can't charge and listen to music at same time, as port same for both, but the phone charges really quickly. Aux headphone adaptor didn't work at first but when I tried different pair of headphones it prompted an update of firmware for the adaptor. Pause function works on my aux headphones but volume controls don't.
customer_reviews.author: Try to buy local but...

customer_reviews.title: Superb
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant, done a test against a friends Galaxy 8 and beats it hands down in all areas except the screen. Audio is superb and camera beyond belief for a smart phone.
customer_reviews.author: Badger47

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: The HTC U11 is Absolutely brilliant. I have always had HTC'S they are always well built and this one is no different the 8 core Qualcomm snapdragon cpu is rapid clocking @ 2.46ghz, Couple that with the 3718mb of RAM and you have an amazing phone that can run anything at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Brown

customer_reviews.title: One minor problem - but, it might be me.
customer_reviews.text: Had this for a few months now and I'm pretty pleased with it so far. Apps install far more quickly. Only one problem, and I think it's more likely to be the OS rather than a hardware issue. I occasionally get incoming phone calls where I can't hear the caller and they can't hear me. Pretty sure I'm not muting the phone inadvertently but, I have to restart the phone to be able to receive calls again. Still investigating.
customer_reviews.author: J. Thomson

customer_reviews.title: Once moreHTC has excelled in a fantastic phone, surpasses all the others I have had
customer_reviews.text: Once moreHTC has excelled in a fantastic phone, surpasses all the others I have had. Also so easy to set up and use.
customer_reviews.author: crazy highlander

customer_reviews.title: though so far all good, very responsive you cant half tell the difference ...
customer_reviews.text: A new toy as my old HTC One was devouring the battery even after a new replacement was installed and also freezing randomly always when you where in the middle of something urgent... Still getting to grips with minor changes in the menu and setup, though so far all good, very responsive you cant half tell the difference and a battery that actually last over a day even in heavy use; fast charge is a god send
customer_reviews.author: Mik Gotheridge

customer_reviews.title: Terrible media playback over bluetooth.
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth connectivity is poor, with media playback intermittent. It's actually a really nice phone, with the exception of the bluetooth, the performance is great. Unfortunately, the problems using the phone to play music or podcasts are really severe. I've tried contacting HTC but no response as yet. If the bluetooth gets fixed in a later update that will help, but for the price you'd really expect it to work straight out the gate.
customer_reviews.author: Justabloke

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Terrible phone and terrible customer service from both the seller and HTC. If you like a poor quality phone which lacks updates and customer support. If you want a secure updated phone then avoid HTC.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Brydon

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant phone
customer_reviews.text: Fast and easy to use Awesome camera Super fast charging Battery lasts 2 days Love it .
customer_reviews.author: Claire Stinchcombe

customer_reviews.title: looks old
customer_reviews.text: Look at the bezel, it looks like a phone from 2015. I wouldn't buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael K

product_meta.title: HTC U11 With Hands-Free ALEXA 64GB Single SIM Factory Unlocked (Brilliant Black) - International Version No Warranty
product_meta.description: The new seamless curved look of HTC U11 is achieved through heating and then bending the glass using extreme pressure. It’s a tricky process to master, but the resulting unique all-around 3-axis symmetry produces a phone that is slim no matter which way you hold it. With 3D glass on both front and back, it’s not only beautiful but more secure and comfortable to hold. In the Box : HTC U11 Smartphone, HTC Rapid Charger 3.0, USB Type-C Cable, USB-C Digital to 3.5mm Audio Jack Adapter, HTC U11 Clear Shield, HTC USonic Adaptive Earphones, Dust Cloth, SIM Tool, Retail Box with IMEI Number
feature_bullets: For USA Buyers : This Smartphone is compatible/will work with any GSM Networks such as AT&T, T-Mobile. For exact 2G GSM, 3G, 4G/LTE compatibility, please check with your network provider in advance prior to your purchase. This phone WILL NOT WORK with any CDMA Networks such as VERIZON, SPRINT, US CELLULAR.
ROM: 64GB, RAM: 4GB Extended memory: microSD up to 2TB
Qualcomm Snapdragon 835, 64 bit octa-core, up to 2.45 Ghz | 12MP (HTC UltraPixel 3 with 1.4μm pixel), Front Camera : 16MP
Battery: 3000 mAh, Talk time on 3G/4G network: up to 24.5 Hours, Standby time on 3G/4G network: up to 14 Days
